channel.title: Optimus Scape
channel.description:
[center] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/jtxxdt.png[/img] [size=24pt][url=http://OptimusScape.host56.com]Forums!![/url][/size] [size=24pt][url=http://OptimusScape.host56.com/webclient.htm]WebClient[/url][/size] Hello everyone. uhm so let me introduce myself and the server. Well my name is Frank and I will be the lead developer of this project. This server is going to be an economy server. My goal in this server is to learn alot and have alot of fun doing it. I am not in this for the money. Well yea, so here's the server :P What the beta testers will get. Beta Testers will receive perm donator on the server, and 1 choice of a spawned item. That's probally the best I can offer. What are beta testers gonna do? Beta testers will play the whole server and look and report as money bugs as possibly, also they get a rank on forums! [size=18pt]Beta Testers: [/size] 10 Available Slots [font=impact]Developers[/font]: (1). Frank (Kronixz) (2). Cj (No forums account) (3). Ashton51 [font=impact] Client Developers[/font] (1). ~available~ [font=impact]Forum Developers[/font] (1). Kronixz Goals: (for server) I will try to this server have alot of things to do instead of players sitting at home. I want to finish all the Minigames 100%, i want to add some custom minigames that are well thought out and not just stupid thing. I will try to keep a trustworthy staff to avoid some abusers. I want to have a great economy, so i wont have to go through an eco reset and have dozens of players quit. I want to try to clean out alot of useless stuff so i can try to prevent lag. I am not going to add shops that give away the good items right away, those items will be earned by hard bosses. I want to the server to be fun but the rules to be followed. I will be adding a donor system, but all the money goes to advertising and paying the coders. Host the server for a while and keep the server updated daily. I will try to keep the Customs very LOW. Goals: (for website) Well first of i want the website to be very eye catching and unique, i need a really good forums. Forums will have these ranks 1) Support team 2) GFX artist 3) Moderator 4) Administrator 5) Forum Admin 6) owner 7) Developer I want the forums to be updated daily with new updates to the server, and try to keep advertisers away as much as possible. On a recent community i had, i was able to add a fb chatting system like thing, i want to add that to the forums. Media: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DrSFlHwV5a0&feature=youtu.be[/youtube] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/fuc96f.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2zgurgx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/pr34n.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/33wbnrk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/wapvuq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/346qbsl.png[/img] Please feel free to apply and i will be happy to add you Requirements for contact: Skype Forum/Website coder application:
Name: age: proof: experience: how active can u be a day:
Client/Server Coder Application
Name: age: proof: experience in java: bio: how active can u be a day:
[/center]

item.title: Optimus Scape
item.dc:creator: @TheAmmoBandit TheAmmoBandit
item.description:
@TheAmmoBandit wrote:

kronixz:

im trying to get a key for sony vegas

**
Edited:
Got Sony Vegas + Fraps if you need a video maker aswell
**

Website/Forum Developer (GFX if needed)

Name: Michaël
age: 16
proof: rexgaming.co.uk (vBulletin: fully secured against anything, fixed all vulns) reverz.net, iphwned.com, others…
experience: Currently folowing Audio Visual wich includes Webdesign and Multimedia at school. Experience in HTML, CSS, JS, jQuery, PHP, MySQL. Alot of experience with SMF and vBulletin (mostly securing vBulletin).

For the GFX part, Highly experienced with Photoshop, inDesign, Illustrator and some flash + Cinema 4D and Sony vegas (but thats VFX)
how active can u be a day: On weekdays, 2-4 Hours. Weekend days may change between 2-10H, (depends on social stuff)

PM me for my skype

Read full topic

item.description:

Updates -
Cleaned up a bunch of shit that was not needed.
deleted crappy mr ex and added teleports to TeleTab
added webclient
found awesome spot for skilling zone

New Ideas -
Going to add a custom map probally for fishing and stuff, idk i never used the custom map maker so ima try it out :3
Going to finish Strong Hold of Security.

-credits Ash and me

other news - Cj wont be coding i guess, he will just be our hoster for now until he decides to add something >.<

item.title: Optimus Scape
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

Name:Ashton, or just Ash for short
age:18
proof:Unfortunately my most successful server OverloadX has been offline for quite some time, We had around 150+ players online at any given time and had the second most votes on Mopar. The listing is no longer on mopar as it has been offline for awhile and fell below the uptime requirement to stay listed. My second most successful RSPS was Proximity, Which was kind of a remake of OverloadX, Same programmers and same base.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=proximityrs.no-ip.org
experience in java:4 Years Java Experience, Real Java Experience not just following stupid mopar tuts
bio:I am 18 years old and have been programming for around 4 Years, I have great knowledge of Java and decent knowledge of C++ and a little bit of C#. I have basic browser based web programming skills (HTML, CSS, Javascript, PHP, Etc etc)
how active can u be a day:Weekdays I am on quite a lot, weekends not as much.

If you have any questions or anything my skype is ashton.51

Read full topic

item.title: Optimus Scape
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:4, topic:438771”]Name:Loveandpower
age:I do not wish to answer
proof: add my msn: eddieconner@live.com …my proof is blocked by mopar censor
experience: I have had three-four years of experience using smf software, about a year and a half with vbulletin software, and about two years of experience with zetaboards (shitty imo xD ). I have been working with html/php on a serious level for a little over a year now.
how active can u be a day: I most likely won’t play to be honest. I am currently looking for a job in real life and also run my own rsps community. I will however state I can finish site/forum assignments within a timely manner.

-Vouches/References upon request.

Also, I would like to point out that I do NOT work with inexperienced programmers. Just as you may do research on me I have done some research on you and I am honestly not getting the feedback concerning your knowledge I was hoping for so it’s to be seen.[/quote]
accepted, welcome to the team. ill add ur msn in a sec

Read full topic
